item.title: Sous Vide Lamb Leg
item.author: kc0bfv@notmet.net (Karl Sickendick)
item.description: Well, I’ve got a couple cooking projects going on today. I’m planning to be home all day, so I’ve started up a lamb leg in the Sous Vide. It’s a 5 lbs New Zealand lamb leg from Costco, all tied up. 1 Tbsp salt 2 Tbsp melted butter 1 Tbsp (actually, a bit more) fresh rosemary 1 tsp pepper (or so) 6 big cloves of garlic 14 Kalmata olives I put all that in the food processor and went until the garlic and rosemary were minced.
